name: TCPanic
description:
This is a fast paced platform game where the player must complete the same level twice - in the two opposite directions.

The player starts as the tcp package being sent from one router and if it fails to reach the other side a new package is immediately sent. Then the player becomes the acknowledge and must travel the same level backwards and with different abilities.

This game was created for Global Game Jam 2017 and works better with a controller.
